H319.def: = pertaining to being located far behind other objects in a row, in a direction away from the spectator; ≈ since the way the ancient Israelites oriented themselves was with their backs facing the East, this term presupposes a westerly direction

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H3559.def: = state in which an object is firmly and immovably located in a certain place

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H5375.def: = process by which an object increases in height

H1389.def: = an elevation of the earth’s surface rising gradually and to a relatively small height from the surrounding level; generally lower than a {L:mountain<SDBH:הַר>}

H5102.def: = action by which humans go to a certain location in great multitudes

H7227.def: = state in which an object is very large in size

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3290.def: = man, also known as {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}; ◄ second son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}; ► one of the patriarchs of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel

H1870.def: = an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives

H734.def: = relatively narrow {L:road<SDBH:דֶּרֶךְ>} that connects two locations and facilitates travelling

H8451.def: = causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H6726.def: = mountain; ► that part of {L:Jerusalem<SDBH:יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם>} on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, YHWH's dwelling place

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H996.def: = the area separating two or mores locations

H7227.def: = state in which an object is very large in size

H3198.def: = action by which someone with judicial authority settles a dispute between two parties

H6099.def: = state in which humans or animals are numerous and therefore potentially powerful

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H3807.def: = causative action by which humans use excessive power to break an object into little pieces

H2719.def: = sharp object; ◄ made out of iron or flint; ► used as tool for various purposes

H855.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H2595.def: = a long, straight rod, usually made of wood, with a sharp {L:iron<SDBH:בַּרְזֶל>} head or point; used for piercing by thrusting; its length varied from the height of a man to much longer

H4211.def: = knife or metal blade, sometimes attached to a long wooden handle; ► used for cutting away or cutting back unproductive branches so they can produce better

H5375.def: = process by which an object increases in height

H3925.def: = process by which humans or animals acquire knowledge or skill from an identified or unidentified source, ► which usually results in a specific behavior or skill

H4421.def: = armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H1612.def: = a creeping plant, which grows along the ground until it finds a tree or other object to climb, using tendrils

H8384.def: = a tree that reaches a height of 5-8 m, with a round crown and very deep roots; its fruit is about the size of a hen’s egg and can be green, yellow, purple, or brown depending on the type; ◄ Ficus carica; ► the fruits are sweet and soft; ≈ the image of peace and happiness in Israel was: “every man under his vine and under his fig tree"

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H2729.def: = state/process by which inanimate objects shake or tremble violently

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H6635.def: = state of being in the service of the community; ≈ sometimes associated with suffering and heavy labor

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H587.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse, including those associated to him or her

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H5769.def: = a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

H5703.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H5002.def: = action by which humans or deities make a prophetic statement; in the case of a deity this is usually done through the mouth of a prophet or seer

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H622.def: = process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war

H6908.def: = action by which humans or animals come together as a group for a common purpose

H5080.def: = state in which one's hand, which holds an instrument like an axe, is raised ► with the purpose of striking it against another object

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H7489.def: literally: to make (one's deeds) wrong; hence: = action by which humans behave in an evil or harmful way

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H1972.def: = state in which humans have been moved to another location far away from their homes

H6099.def: = state in which humans or animals are numerous and therefore potentially powerful

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H4427.def: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H6726.def: = mountain; ► that part of {L:Jerusalem<SDBH:יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם>} on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, YHWH's dwelling place

H6258.def: = a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H5769.def: = a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

H4029.def: = location, possibly a somewhat elevated place from which one could overlook a relatively large area of land; ◄ located near {L:Jerusalem<SDBH:יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם>} and {L:Bethlehem<SDBH:בֵּית לֶחֶם>}

H6076.def: always as K of {L:טְחֹרִים<SDBH:טְחֹרִים>}; exact meaning uncertain: = swelling of internal parts of the body or sores; ◄ probably due to an infectious disease such as dysentery or bubonic plague; ≈ regarded as painful, enfeebling and threatening to a community

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H6726.def: = mountain; ► that part of {L:Jerusalem<SDBH:יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם>} on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, YHWH's dwelling place

H7223.def: = state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range

H4475.def: = state in which humans or, by extension, celestial bodies, are in a high position of authority over others

H857.def: = to move to a certain location, seen from that location's perspective

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H4467.def: = state in which a person or deity has been entrusted with the office of {L:king<SDBH:מֶלֶךְ>} or {L:queen<SDBH:מַלְכָּה>}

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H4100.def: = a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

H6258.def: = a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place

H7452.def: = the non-verbal sounds made by a large group of people in response to a situation, either positively or negatively

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H3289.def: = action by which humans or deities exercise their minds to determine how they are going to achieve a particular purpose

H6.def: = state of not being located in the place where it is expected to be

H2388.def: = state in which humans or deities are strong in a physical, political, or military sense, or simply in their ability to convince others with words

H2342.def: = action by which humans delay action until the right moment, with a certain amount of confidence that this moment will actually come

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H6726.def: = mountain; ► that part of {L:Jerusalem<SDBH:יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם>} on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, YHWH's dwelling place

H6258.def: = a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H7151.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H7704.def: = a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H894.def: = town; ◄ in {L:Mesopotamia<SDBH:שִׁנְעָר>}; ► founded by {L:Nimrod<SDBH:נִמְרֹד>}; location of "tower of Babel"; capital of {L:Chaldean<SDBH:כַּשְׂדִּים>} empire

H5337.def: = causative action by which humans remove an object from a situation where it could be damaged

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H3709.def: = the inner part of the human {L:hand<SDBH:יָד>}, but with special focus on the activities performed with it, such as holding, covering, or lifting objects, leaning on a staff, clapping, etc.

H341.def: = state in which someone is engaged in a conflict with  someone else and acts accordingly

H6258.def: = a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place

H7227.def: = state in which an object is very large in size

H622.def: = process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H2610.def: = process by which land becomes impure as a result of the morally and ethically unacceptable things that happen there, ► and therefore unfit for God to associate with

H2372.def: = process by which someone perceives an important object with the eyes, or witnesses an event of some significance

H6726.def: = mountain; ► that part of {L:Jerusalem<SDBH:יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם>} on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, YHWH's dwelling place

18.gl: to be defiled > to be destroyed

H3045.def: = process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

H4284.def: = procedure for achieving a certain purpose, originating from someone's לֵב mind

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H995.def: = state in which someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence

H6908.def: = action by which humans or animals come together as a group for a common purpose

H5995.def: = harvested grain, whether bundled in sheaves or not

H1637.def: = level, circular area about 7.5 to 12 meters in diameter, where people threshed their grain; usually located near the fields where the grain was grown, and if possible, in an elevated area that was exposed to the breeze

H1758.def: = causative action by which humans separate grain from straw by having animals trample it or by dragging a threshing board over it; ≈ often used figuratively to denote acts of aggression

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H6726.def: = mountain; ► that part of {L:Jerusalem<SDBH:יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם>} on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, YHWH's dwelling place

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H1270.def: = a strong, hard magnetic silvery-grey metal, ► used in construction and manufacturing; ≈ associated with strength and permanence

H5154.def: = a yellowish-brown alloy of copper with up to one-third tin, ≈ regarded as a hard and difficult to bend

H1854.def: = state in which an object has been reduced to fine particles

H7227.def: = state in which an object is very large in size

glosses: (someone with a) split, disfigured (ear, nose, or lip)
H2763.def: = state in which an object is (partly or entirely) split into two parts

H1215.def: = possessions accumulated through advantageous transactions, in which part of the income can be kept for oneself, mostly achieved in an unjust way

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H113.def: = man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
